title: House and Senate Leaders Release Bipartisan Discussion Draft of Comprehensive Data Privacy Bill
description: Washington, D.C. – Energy and Commerce Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA), Energy and Commerce Chairman Frank Pallone (D-NJ), and Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation Ranking Member Roger Wicker (R-MS) today released a discussion draft of a comprehensive national data privacy and data security framework. The draft legislation is the first comprehensive privacy proposal to gain bipartisan, bicameral support.

title: Leader Rodgers Statement on the Decision of OPEC and Russia to Increase Oil Production
description: Washington, D.C. — House Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) released the following statement on the Biden administration welcoming the decision of OPEC and Russia to increase their production of oil, ahead of an expected visit to Saudi Arabia by President Biden.

title: Rodgers and Guthrie Statement on 2022 Medicare Trustees Report
description: Washington, D.C. — Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) and Health Subcommittee Republican Leader Brett Guthrie (R-KY) released the following statement regarding the 2022 Medicare Trustees Report.

title: E&C Republican Leaders Demand Answers from Sec. Granholm on America’s Strategic Energy Reserves
description: China Continues to Build Its Reserves While Biden Depletes America’s
